sentences.sContent: This was the first (and last) time that I dared to defy my mother.
sentences.sCn: 这是我第一次（也是最后一次）胆敢违抗我母亲。

synos.tran: 藐视；公然反抗；挑衅；使落空

remMethod.val: de(离开)+fy(信赖)→远离信赖→不服从， (公然)违抗

trans.tranCn: 藐视；公然反抗；挑衅；使落空
trans.tranOther: If you defy someone or something that is trying to make you behave in a particular way, you refuse to obey them and behave in that way
